what: download data from Human Development Report Office (HDRO)
title: download data from Human Development Report Office (HDRO)
text: goal hdR download data Human Development Report Office (HDRO) using API.

title: download data from Human Development Report Office (HDRO)
text: can install development version hdR GitHub :

title: download data from Human Development Report Office (HDRO)
code: library(hdR)  brazil <- country_indicators(country = "BRA",                              year = 2020,                              indicator = "hdi")  brazil #> # A tibble: 1 × 5 #>   country      index                         indicator               year  value #>   <chr>        <chr>                         <chr>                   <chr> <chr> #> 1 BRA - Brazil HDI - Human Development Index hdi - Human Developmen… 2020  0.758

what: Retrieves country indicators data from HDR Data API — country_indicators
title: Retrieves country indicators data from HDR Data API — country_indicators
text: function retrieves country indicators data HDR Data API based specified country year.

title: Retrieves country indicators data from HDR Data API — country_indicators
code: country_indicators(country = NULL, year = NULL, indicator = NULL)

title: Retrieves country indicators data from HDR Data API — country_indicators
text: country character string specifying country ISO code indicators data requested. year integer specifying year indicators data requested.

title: Retrieves country indicators data from HDR Data API — country_indicators
text: data frame containing country indicators data.

title: Retrieves country indicators data from HDR Data API — country_indicators
